name: yokai run
description: "As the sun began to rise over the dense forest, a figure emerged from the undergrowth, walking with purpose through the twisting paths. This was no ordinary stroll in the woods, for the path ahead was littered with massive heads, each looming threateningly over the path. Despite the daunting challenge before them, the figure pressed on. They have to skillfully dodge and weave between the giant heads. Their destination is the village at the end of the forest, and nothing will stand in their way."
